boardgame.name: Auf nach Indien!
En Route vers les Indes
Rumbo a la India
Rumbo a la India
Sail to India
Путь в Индию
セイルトゥインディア
boardgame.description: The Age of Discovery, Portugal, 15th_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash;16th century: With the Mediterranean under Osman Turk control, the Portuguese were severely limited in the Mediterranean and looking for other trade routes. Better ships, better compasses, and a general centralization of power helped push the Portuguese explorers into the Atlantic, and sailors like Prince Henry, Bartolomeu Dias and Vasco da Gama took to the seas._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Sail to India (セイルトゥインディア), the players are nobles who support these sailors in their efforts to discover a route to India and to be the foremost and most famous explorer of all. Players must manage their resources to develop sales channels to India, and they have only two Action Points with which to do it. A player's money, score, ship and building are all affected by the same pawn, and to do well you'll need to manage the movement of that pawn to make full use of twelve types of actions, six kinds of products, and three different buildings._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepublisher: ぶんぶんゲームズ (Bunbun Games)
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Episode 76-- Spiel des Jahres chat and What we have been playing With guests Joel Eddy and Paul Owen
Episode 77 Origins preview, Buonocore drops by, and Xmen chat (spoilers)
Garrett_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Games 401 - ebbes and Sail to India, plus Comments
I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve Been Diced! episode 62: Our 2014 in review

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: This is a brand new copy of Sail to India. I bought a spare because I really love this designer. This is the beautiful Japanese version :) The game has only 1 card (x4 one per each player) that is in Japanese. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll also include some Japanese snacks to the box. If you would like to add any other Japanese games please tell me :) An estimate of shipping to the US is about $14.50US

Multilingual second edition by Okazu. The game is like new. English, German, French and Japanese rules are included as well. Shipping costs (Maxi letter): Germany: 2.50 EUR EU / Worldwide: 7.00 EUR Please ask for costs if you want other shipping options. Payment via bank transfer is preferred. Paypal is possible. Please add 2 EUR to the price for payment via Paypal.

Okazu multilingual second edition. Played a few times but complete and in very good shape. I have both the original blue and green cubes and replacement blue and green cubes that are much easier to distinguish from each other and will sell the replacements together with the original ones.

OKAZU Multilingual second edition (English,French,German) Very good condition, only played once. Cards are sleeved. Shipping costs without insurance and tracking: Germany: 2,50 € Rest of world: 3,50 € Shipping costs including insurance and tracking: Germany: 6,90 € Rest of EU: 16,90 € Worldwide: 31,90 € Payment options: - Paypal - Bank transfer (only within EU)

for aquabob79 only You also get patronize as a bonus.

Alderac Entertainment Group (AEG5805) With the Mediterranean under Osman Turkish control, the Portuguese are looking for alternative routes to the East Indies, moved by the trade of gold, spices and other goods. Better ships and general centralization of power help push the Portuguese out into the Atlantic, and explorers like Prince Henry, Bartolomeu Dias and Vasco da Gama took to the sea. In Sail to India, players take on the role of a powerful noble and supply expeditions in search of lucrative trade routes. Players gain victory points by discovering new coastal towns, selling trade goods and constructing buildings. Players can also acquire technologies, which grant powerful abilities during the game. Discover the route to India and seize the greatest wealth and prestige!
Opened, but never played. In perfect condition. This is the AEG version.

Game: Auf nach Indien! (Pegasus) Condition: new in shrinkwrap Language: German Payment: Bank transfer to an EU bank account using IBAN/BIC in advance (normally free of charge if your bank account is nominated in EURO) Paypal (add 3,- Euro to cover the fees. That should be the first choice for non-EU customers.) Pick up the game at my game store (no shipping cost) Shipping: always insured and with tracking Germany: 5,99€ for the first item card games or smaller boxes might be cheaper (please contact me beforehand) EU: 13,99€ up to 2kg 15,99€ up to 5kg 20,99€ up to 10kg Rest of the world: Please contact me before purchasing an item to clarify the shipping costs. I can offer discounts on shipping if multiple marketplace purchases are made. Returns and Cancellation: You may cancel your order without giving any reasons within 14 days after placing your order. Please contact spieleberatung@t-online.de and I will attempt to resolve the matter. Unopened copies of the game that are no longer wanted can be returned, but there is a 10% restocking fee payable of the item price and the buyer is responsible for the return shipping costs. Spieleberatung Frank Solnitzky Hainbuchenweg 1 36381 Schlüchtern Germany +49-06661-9115039 spieleberatung@t-online.de
